description:
Well receives an enormous reward for his exploration of the ancient ruins, garnering the envy of other nobles. He also learns about the rumors of his death. So when Well decides to leave the Capital, he asks Roderich, the man who constantly sought to become his retainer, to take charge of his mansion. Roderich is moved to tears and immediately begins acting to pin down the culprit behin the rumors.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Des ennemis ? Dites-moi que je rêve !
Kiraware Monotte, Sore wa Nai Deshou!
People Hate Me? Are You Kidding Me?!
嫌われ者って, それはないでしょう!
